node.name: BNM Eclipse plugin
node.shortdescription:
BNM is not Maven. BNM is rather a prof of possible enhancements to Maven. This plugins provides Eclipse integration of BNM.
0.1.0 - easier project import and project creation - interleaved builder: opened projects are build by eclipse, required/dependent projects are build by BNM - way faster than Maven 3 - enhanced version management
V 0.0.5: - adds a deploy plugin implementation.
node.body:
BNM is not Maven. BNM is rather a prof of possible enhancements to Maven. This plugins provides Eclipse integration of BNM.
0.1.0 - easier project import and project creation - interleaved builder: opened projects are build by eclipse, required/dependent projects are build by BNM - way faster than Maven 3 - enhanced version management
V 0.0.5: - adds a deploy plugin implementation.
